programme.title: JAG: Psychic Warrior
programme.desc: When a Navy research project involving ESP and psychic phenomenon goes awry, resulting in the death of one of the research subjects, the Admiral in charge is court-martialed.

programme.title: JAG: Rouge
programme.desc: As the lowest ranking lawyer at JAG, Bud is assigned to accompany Raglan, a former Special Forces operative who is hired by the Pentagon to test security at military bases.

programme.title: JAG: Mishap
programme.desc: Skates", Harm's RIO when he was aboard the USS Patrick Henry, was the Landing Safety Officer in charge of the deck when a Tomcat crashes while making an emergency landing.

programme.title: JAG: Rouge
programme.desc: As the lowest ranking lawyer at JAG, Bud is assigned to accompany Raglan, a former Special Forces operative who is hired by the Pentagon to test security at military bases.

programme.title: JAG: Mishap
programme.desc: Skates", Harm's RIO when he was aboard the USS Patrick Henry, was the Landing Safety Officer in charge of the deck when a Tomcat crashes while making an emergency landing.

programme.title: JAG: Into the Breach
programme.desc: Harm and Mac agree to help guide young student "attorneys" at Iron Forge Naval Academy, a prep school for the US Naval Academy, as they conduct a mock trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Boomerang (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hostilities between Harm and Brumby escalate both in and out of the courtroom and it takes Chegwidden, with Brumby's CO's approval to get them to deal with their anger.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People V. Gunny
programme.desc: Gunny is charged with gay-bashing following an off duty altercation outside a gay bar.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wave Goodbye
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must prevent an incoming tsunami from hitting a vulnerable nuclear power facility, and Toby secretly helps his ex-fiancée retrieve her stolen identity.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Messy Houses
programme.desc: While answering a domestic disturbance call, Andyʼs personal life is turned inside out when the social worker on the scene turns out to be her estranged mother.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of a grad-student-turned escort, the officers discover a pattern of missing women. Since Gail fits the physical description of the victims, she is sent on an undercover sting at a high-end hotel.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case – bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: There are many ghost said to haunt Gloucester Prison, from the passive to the most aggressive and as Stuart enters the segregation block he soon fears for his life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: The education block of HMP Gloucester is an eerie set of corridors and empty rooms. Stuart enters for the first time and gradually realises that something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: Some places, just by their name, instill fear into those who hear it, Gloucester Prison is such a lace and Karl investigates the main cell block in an evening he will never forget.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: The education block of HMP Gloucester is an eerie set of corridors and empty rooms. Stuart enters for the first time and gradually realises that something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: HMP Gloucester is a houses a huge selection of buildings, Karl investigates one block where spirits are said to make themselves known on a regular basis.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the very haunted school room in the large imposing Gressenhall Workhouse. The activity starts even before Karl gets into the building and becomes one of the most impressive investigations to date.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt1
programme.desc: The formidable visage of Guys Cliff House, a once great home, is awe inspiring, as are the stories pf paranormal activity within. Now home to the Masonic fraternity it is home to two temples and many lodges and chapters.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt2
programme.desc: The lower Temple in this once great, but now ruined castle, is steeped in history and tales pf ghostly happenings. Stuart investigates a room that is said to house multiple spirits and feels something is watching him in the dark.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts in the Attic
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS has been called to the Grzelak house in Massachusetts where they have been experiencing paranormal activity since the day they moved in 30 years ago.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts in the Attic
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS has been called to the Grzelak house in Massachusetts where they have been experiencing paranormal activity since the day they moved in 30 years ago.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Camp Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Jason and TAPS go to camp! They head to Camp Rutledge in Georgia where a woman has experienced paranormal activity since she was a teenager.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Camp Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Jason and TAPS go to camp! They head to Camp Rutledge in Georgia where a woman has experienced paranormal activity since she was a teenager.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 16
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Well of Horror
programme.desc: TAPS is joined by Jason's daughter, Haily, on two cases; The Shanley Hotel in Napanoch, New York and Old Fort Niagara, in Youngstown, New York. Both cases involve a gruesome death that took place at a well, instigating paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.239
programme.desc: A landlord fights with tenants over a new motorcycle ignition, a damaged helmet, and an insurance bill; he countersues for unpaid rent and utilities.\t\t\t\r\nA young woman goes after her former roommate and his girlfriend for rent and a security deposit.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.190
programme.desc: A landlord/tenant dispute escalates when a man is accused of illegally entering an apartment on three different occasions and a woman is accused of damaging property.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.118
programme.desc: Teenage brothers' domestic assault leads to mother suing ex-husband for sons' attorney fees/Man sued by older girlfriend for car money owed, disputes gift claim.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.185
programme.desc: A woman’s life-long dream to have plastic surgery is fulfilled by her ex-fiancé who demands that he be paid back; a Christmas day fight over child custody further escalates their fight.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.23
programme.desc: A man is accused of assaulting his daughter and fracturing her back; she sues him for the cost of medical bills/A Harley Davidson is repossessed and a friendship ends when women fight over late payments on the vehicle.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.15
programme.desc: Ex live-in lovers fight over a truck repossession, a large co-signed loan, and insurance/After an arrest for stealing a lawnmower, a man is allegedly bailed out by his girlfriend who claims she helped pay for his gall bladder surgery.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.190
programme.desc: A landlord/tenant dispute escalates when a man is accused of illegally entering an apartment on three different occasions and a woman is accused of damaging property.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.118
programme.desc: Teenage brothers' domestic assault leads to mother suing ex-husband for sons' attorney fees/Man sued by older girlfriend for car money owed, disputes gift claim.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.185
programme.desc: A woman’s life-long dream to have plastic surgery is fulfilled by her ex-fiancé who demands that he be paid back; a Christmas day fight over child custody further escalates their fight.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.23
programme.desc: A man is accused of assaulting his daughter and fracturing her back; she sues him for the cost of medical bills/A Harley Davidson is repossessed and a friendship ends when women fight over late payments on the vehicle.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.222
programme.desc: A man sues his child's mother for an unpaid cable bill and missing belongings, admitting he owes her back child support. A father and his adult son fight over $60,000 in back child support and $5,000 in allegedly misappropriated emergency money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.130
programme.desc: Man, after serving four years for robbery, accused of assaulting ex-girlfriend; his new girlfriend admits to breaking ex's car window/A teenager sues tow truck driver and car dealer for return of money paid for used Dodge Stratus.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.56
programme.desc: 14-year-old accused of damaging neighbor's screen door; claims inability to reach damaged spot. Ex-lovers dispute cost to terminate Las Vegas timeshare; one alleges never using the property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.71
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-husband of assaulting her with binoculars after accusing him of cheating on Mother’s Day. Boy accused of hitting child with rock; child’s mother sues ex-live-in boyfriend for cost of fixing daughter’s broken teeth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.198
programme.desc: A teenager, awarded a scholarship, admits to stealing a phone and erasing contacts. Another teen is accused of urinating in ex-friend's gas tanks as a joke.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.208
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute ownership of a snow blower, weight bench, and alleged loan. License plate found in damaged car from a crash, but alleged party denies responsibility.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.154
programme.desc: A man says he was thrown on top of a car by a club bouncer after being wrongfully accused of hitting someone in the bathroom.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her twin brother for allegedly drinking, driving her car without permission, and wrecking it.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After both teams are reorganized, the chefs blindly choose ingredients from which they must create a unique dish; the chefs must serve a five-course meal to UNICEF Ambassador Angie Harmon and other VIP attendees.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants face the blind taste test, with the winning team getting an ice skating lesson with figure skater Rachael Flatt, and the contestants struggle to stay organized during the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay challenges the teams to create entrees with high dollar values, using ingredients purchased on a small budget. Three previous winners judge individual contestants' entrees.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants face the blind taste test, with the winning team getting an ice skating lesson with figure skater Rachael Flatt, and the contestants struggle to stay organized during the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The red team and the blue team each create their own menus, from which guests can order during dinner service, the team that impresses diners with its food and service wins the challenge, contestants face elimination.(c)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay challenges the teams to create entrees with high dollar values, using ingredients purchased on a small budget. Three previous winners judge individual contestants' entrees.(c)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants prepare a dinner service with guests from OxFam America, including Minnie Driver, and two chefs struggle with their stations.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants travel to the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, where they cook gourmet versions of tailgate party food favourites for hungry football fans.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Special guest and comic book legend Stan Lee takes a seat at the chef's table, where he and his friends comment about the action in the kitchen as the service progresses.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(c)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party.

programme.title: Operation Repo: All the Wrong Moves
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Airplane Arrest
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia are overwhelmed by a swarm of cheerleaders; Matt and Froy interrupt a father and son bonding session gone wrong; the team heads to the raceway to prove they still have what it takes.

programme.title: Operation Repo: All the Wrong Moves
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Heart Attack Panic
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia are caught in a desperate situation when the owner of their target car is struck by a heart attack. Plus, a repo becomes violent under the watchful eye of the finance company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Sting Operation Blues
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou find themselves in the middle of nowhere in a tooth-and-nail fight with a trio of nerdy stargazers, Froy and Sonia find a cooperative old man to be a hassle after agreeing to let him get his stuff out of his cluttered car.(c)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets. Sonia and Froy's repo from a creepy husband reveals some incriminating evidence to his wife.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Showstopper
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets. Sonia and Froy's repo from a creepy husband reveals some incriminating evidence to his wife, and when Lou and Sonia can't locate their target car, Lou comes up...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Nursery Crime
programme.desc: While attempting a repo of a "green energy" bio-diesel vehicle, Froy's (Froylan Tercero) lack of knowledge of the vehicle's specialized fuel system sets the bus ablaze... and when his error causes it to explode, he and Matt (Matt Burch) abandon builders.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Call for Help
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos. Matt and Froy are in danger when Froy refuses to call the cops on a gun-wielding debtor.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Big Letdown
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Waiting Game
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.(c)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?(c)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(c)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(c)

programme.title: Dead Space
programme.desc: A deadly virus attacks the crew of a Saturn space station.(n)

programme.title: Frank Herbert's Dune: Episode 1
programme.desc: On order of the emperor, Duke Leto Atreides moves his family from his home planet Caladan to another planet, Arrakis, also known as Dune. After an attack on their stronghold, his son Paul and his concubine flee into the desert.(n)

programme.title: Daybreakers
programme.desc: The year is 2019, and an unknown plague has transformed the world's population into blood-thirsty vampires. As humans and their blood become more scarce, vampires must search for new ways to satisfy their craving.

programme.title: Blackball
programme.desc: In the world of spectator sports, there are of course the all time greats: football, rugby, tennis, golf and... lawn bowls? Try as he might, Cliff Starkey (Paul Kaye) just can't keep out of trouble.(c)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master. Starring: Clive Owen, Morgan Freeman, Aksel Hennie.

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master. Starring: Clive Owen, Morgan Freeman, Aksel Hennie.(c)

programme.title: Dragon Warriors
programme.desc: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon to terrorize the land. Starring: James Marsters, Kaitlin Doubleday, Luke Perry.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: A runaway bride does some soul-searching when she’s trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: A runaway bride does some soul-searching when she’s trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: Hapless Insurance Loss Adjuster - Martin Dyer - feels his life is spiralling out of control but discovers that even when you reach rock bottom, that some clouds really do have a silver lining.(n)

programme.title: A Beauty And The Beast Christmas
programme.desc: Social Media influencer Ginger Holiday is convinced by her agent to fake a romance with viral bad boy Beau Bradley to gain more followers. Initially they can't stand each other but the feelings they had to fake might just be turning into something real.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girl, Cop, Killer? The Bambi Bembenek Story
programme.desc: A former cop is convicted of killing her husband's ex-wife. Based on a true story.

programme.desc: A former cop is convicted of killing her husband's ex-wife. Based on a true story.(c)

programme.desc: A twisted psychological thriller about a man haunted by his past.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy: Blood and Iron
programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his fellow agents (Selma Blair, Doug Jones) encounter ghosts, monsters and a resurrected female vampire.

programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his fellow agents (Selma Blair, Doug Jones) encounter ghosts, monsters and a resurrected female vampire.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.(n)

programme.title: John Wayne: An Innocent Man
programme.desc: Wrongly imprisoned for murder, a man escapes and infiltrates a gang of outlaws to find the real killer. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Nancy Shubert, Lane Chandler.

programme.title: John Wayne: Cold Vengeance
programme.desc: After seeing his father gunned down, a young man vows to bring the desperados to justice. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Marion Burns, Dennis Moore.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.desc: Inspired by the classic fairy-tale, we follow a young girl who meets an enchanting woman she believes to be the real “Little Mermaid”. Starring: William Moseley, Poppy Drayton, Loreto Peralta.

programme.desc: Inspired by the classic fairy-tale, we follow a young girl who meets an enchanting woman she believes to be the real “Little Mermaid”. Starring: William Moseley, Poppy Drayton, Loreto Peralta.

programme.title: Grace and Goliath
programme.desc: Hollywood big-shot Josh Jenkins sweeps into Belfast to make a movie, but before long his world crashes and he loses everything. Hotel cleaner Lily invites him to stay with her family and gradually the people of this 'strange' city touch his heart forever.(n)

programme.title: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
programme.desc: When a violent earthquake rocks Southern California, hapless teenager Calvin Fuller (Thomas Ian Nicholas) finds himself careening through a hole torn in the fabric of time.(n)

programme.title: Time Out
programme.desc: In between caring for her ailing mother (Whoopi Goldberg), Nicole (Tessa Thompson) works at a nearby prison.

programme.desc: In between caring for her ailing mother (Whoopi Goldberg), Nicole (Tessa Thompson) works at a nearby prison.(c)

programme.desc: Romance blooms between two 30-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector and a woman who is the dark horse of her family.(n)

programme.title: Hidden Homicide
programme.desc: A writer wakes up in a strange place with a gun in his hand and a dead body, but he doesn't remember how he got there or what really happened.(n)

programme.desc: When a man drops dead in Harry's office, Harry is led to investigate a complex murder plot with ties to Bob's past.

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Dresden takes on a case pro bono after a woman coming to him for help is killed in front of him, but the investigation leads to dark magic and more death.

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Dresden runs up against the High Council when they suspect him in the deaths of a college coed and a local mobster from black magic.

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Harry is forced to get a license to continue working for the police department, but when his teacher turns up dead of black magic he teams with man's assistant in a case that takes fertile twist.(n)

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: A one night stand turns deadly when an old nemesis of Harry's reappears.(n)

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Morgan and Ancient Mai reluctantly take refuge at Harry's.(n)

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Man in Power
programme.desc: Brady aids the heirs of a Middle East king, who has been murdered by his power-crazy army chief to regain their father's throne.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)
